premium.script:
spot = source(close, type=spot)
perp = source(close, type=perp)
cloudarea(spot-perp, 0, title=Premium)
premium.name: Premium

cvd-spot.name: CVD SPOT
cvd-spot.script:
buyVol = source(vbuy, type=spot)
sellVol = source(vsell, type=spot)
line(cum(buyVol - sellVol), title=SPOT)

cvd-perp.name: CVD PERP
cvd-perp.script:
buyVol = source(vbuy, type=perp)
sellVol = source(vsell, type=perp)
line(cum(buyVol - sellVol), title=PERP)

keltner.name: Keltner Channel
keltner.script:
price = avg_ohlc(bar)
close = avg_close(bar)

range = price.high - price.low
averageRange = sma(range, options.length)

basis = ema(close, options.length)
dev = options.mult * averageRange
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plotline(basis, color=options.basisColor)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper)

delta-spot.name: Delta Spot
delta-spot.script:
_vbuy = source(vbuy, type=spot)
_vsell = source(vsell, type=spot)
volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
avg = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = options.mult * stdev
treshold = avg + dev
delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Δ Spot")

delta-perp.name: Delta Perp
delta-perp.script:
_vbuy = source(vbuy, type=perp)
_vsell = source(vsell, type=perp)
volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
avg = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = options.mult * stdev
treshold = avg + dev
delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Δ Perp")

volume.name: Volume

_j6xgdeja81y01qfu.name: CVD Spot Big
_j6xgdeja81y01qfu.script:
// Buy
buy_vol = source(vbuy, type=spot)
buy_close = source(cbuy, type=spot)
buySize = buy_vol / buy_close

// Bolliger bands around Buy Size
a_buy = sma(Math.pow(buySize, 2), options.length)
b_buy = Math.pow(sum(buySize, options.length),2) / Math.pow(options.length, 2)
stdev_buy = Math.sqrt(a_buy - b_buy)
basis_buy = sma(buySize, options.length)
dev_buy = options.mult * stdev_buy
upper_buy = basis_buy + dev_buy
lower_buy = basis_buy - dev_buy

// Sell
sell_vol = source(vsell, type=spot)
sell_close = source(csell, type=spot)
sellSize = sell_vol / sell_close

// Bolliger bands around Sell Size
a_sell = sma(Math.pow(sellSize, 2), options.length)
b_sell = Math.pow(sum(sellSize, options.length),2) / Math.pow(options.length, 2)
stdev_sell = Math.sqrt(a_sell - b_sell)
basis_sell = sma(sellSize, options.length)
dev_sell = options.mult * stdev_sell
upper_sell = basis_sell + dev_sell
lower_sell = basis_sell - dev_sell

// CVD
bv = buySize > upper_buy ? vbuy: 0
sv = sellSize > upper_sell ? vsell: 0
line(cum(bv - sv), title=Spot Big)

_gyovgnu9maq1uwle.name: CVD Spot Mid
_gyovgnu9maq1uwle.script:
// Buy
buy_vol = source(vbuy, type=spot)
buy_close = source(cbuy, type=spot)
buySize = buy_vol / buy_close

// Bolliger bands around Buy Size
a_buy = sma(Math.pow(buySize, 2), options.length)
b_buy = Math.pow(sum(buySize, options.length),2) / Math.pow(options.length, 2)
stdev_buy = Math.sqrt(a_buy - b_buy)
basis_buy = sma(buySize, options.length)
dev_buy = options.mult * stdev_buy
upper_buy = basis_buy + dev_buy
lower_buy = basis_buy - dev_buy

// Sell
sell_vol = source(vsell, type=spot)
sell_close = source(csell, type=spot)
sellSize = sell_vol / sell_close

// Bolliger bands around Sell Size
a_sell = sma(Math.pow(sellSize, 2), options.length)
b_sell = Math.pow(sum(sellSize, options.length),2) / Math.pow(options.length, 2)
stdev_sell = Math.sqrt(a_sell - b_sell)
basis_sell = sma(sellSize, options.length)
dev_sell = options.mult * stdev_sell
upper_sell = basis_sell + dev_sell
lower_sell = basis_sell - dev_sell

// CVD
bv = (buySize > lower_buy) && (buySize < upper_buy)? vbuy: 0
sv = (sellSize > lower_sell) && (sellSize < upper_sell) ? vsell: 0
line(cum(bv - sv), title=Spot Mid)

_zjxpbo8j4zw1foku.name: CVD Perp Small
_zjxpbo8j4zw1foku.script:
// Buy
buy_vol = source(vbuy, type=perp)
buy_close = source(cbuy, type=perp)
buy_size = buy_vol / buy_close

// Bolliger bands around Buy Size
a_buy = sma(Math.pow(buy_size, 2), options.length)
b_buy = Math.pow(sum(buy_size, options.length),2) / Math.pow(options.length, 2)
stdev_buy = Math.sqrt(a_buy - b_buy)
basis_buy = sma(buy_size, options.length)
dev_buy = options.mult * stdev_buy
upper_buy = basis_buy + dev_buy
lower_buy = basis_buy - dev_buy

// Sell
sell_vol = source(vsell, type=spot)
sell_close = source(csell, type=spot)
sell_size = sell_vol / sell_close

// Bolliger bands around Sell Size
a_sell = sma(Math.pow(sell_size, 2), options.length)
b_sell = Math.pow(sum(sell_size, options.length),2) / Math.pow(options.length, 2)
stdev_sell = Math.sqrt(a_sell - b_sell)
basis_sell = sma(sell_size, options.length)
dev_sell = options.mult * stdev_sell
upper_sell = basis_sell + dev_sell
lower_sell = basis_sell - dev_sell

// CVD
bv = buy_size < lower_buy ? vbuy: 0
sv = sell_size < lower_sell ? vsell: 0
line(cum(bv-sv), title=Perp Small)
